overview:
Sanmaya kumar Dhal is the founder of 4Dwebdesigning now 8i Creations, a website creation and branding company.

Sanmaya drove his firm from a zero funded to now a well established firm in its domain with a short time of one year. He is very targeted towards providing the best websites of the age. He is by born an innovator. He is now working on several mix of web3.0 technologies to designing.

Sanmaya is now doing his bachelores in engineering in Mechanical from Vishweswaraiah Technological University, Belgaum. He is also very much passionate about astronomy, astrophysics, cycle riding, writing poetries, stories and novels. His papers in astronomy are highly acclaimed. He is a winner of “Joy Jagannath Award 2005” for the best young mind in astro sciences. He is a fun lover and wrote several poem in Oriya, Hindi and English which were published in various magazines. As a nature lover he used to wonder through mountains, forests with his little cycle in his free time.

He is an life member of SCAAA (Samanta Chandra Sekhar Amateur Astronomers’ Association, BBSR), HWG, Indian community for web usability and several others.

He is a children lover and whenever he is in Puri, his native, he used to go to his childhood school Shree Vihar Sishu Mandiram and teach science and astronomy to the young children.
